Name: Viserai, Rune Blood
Functional Text: Whenever you play a Runeblade card, if you've played another non-attack action card this turn, create a Runechant token.

Name: Nebula Blade
Functional Text:
**Once per Turn Action** - {r}{r}: **Attack**

When this hits, create a Runechant token.

If you've played a non-attack action card this turn, this gets +3{p}.

Functional Text: **Temper**

Name: Bloodsheath Skeleta
Functional Text:
**Instant** - Destroy this: The next attack action card and non-attack action card you play this turn get "This card costs {r} less to play for each Runechant you control."

**Temper**

Functional Text:
**Action** - Destroy this: Create 2 Runechant tokens. **Go again**

**Arcane Barrier 1**

Name: Sutcliffe's Suede Hides
Functional Text: **Attack Reaction** - {r}, destroy this: Target attack action card gets **go again**. Activate this only if you've played a non-attack action card this turn.

When this hits, create Runechant tokens equal to the damage dealt this way.

Name: Condemn to Slaughter

Your next Runeblade attack this turn gets +3{p}.

Functional Text:
Destroy an aura you control. If you do, create 3 Runechant tokens.

**Go again**

Name: Malefic Incantation
Functional Text:
**Go again**

This enters the arena with 3 verse counters. When it has none, destroy it.

Once per turn, when you play an attack action card, remove a verse counter from this. If you do, create a Runechant token.

Name: Mordred Tide
Functional Text:
Until end of turn, if you would create one or more Runechant tokens, instead create that many plus 1.

**Go again**

Name: Read the Runes
Functional Text: Create 3 Runechant tokens.

Name: Revel in Runeblood
Functional Text:
If you've played an attack action card and another non-attack action card this turn, create 4 Runechant tokens.

At the beginning of your end phase, destroy all Runechants you control.

**Go again**

Name: Sonata Arcanix
Functional Text:
Reveal the top X+3 cards of your deck.

For each non-attack action card revealed this way, put an attack action card revealed this way into your hand. Then deal arcane damage to target hero equal to the number of cards put into your hand this way. Shuffle, then banish this.

Name: Become the Arknight
Functional Text:
**Viserai Specialization**

You may discard an action card. If you discard an attack action card this way, search your deck for a Runeblade non-attack action card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you discard a non-attack action card this way, search your deck for a Runeblade attack action card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle. **Go again**

Name: Mauvrion Skies
Functional Text:
The next Runeblade attack action card you play this turn gets **go again** and "When this hits, create a Runechant token."

**Go again**

Name: Sigil of the Arknight
Functional Text:
**Go again**

At the beginning of your action phase, destroy this.

When this leaves the arena, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an attack action card, put it into your hand.

Name: Tome of the Arknight
Functional Text:
Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. If you reveal an attack action card and a non-attack action card this way, put them into your hand.

**Go again**

Name: Runechant
Functional Text: When you play an attack action card or activate a weapon attack, destroy this and deal 1 arcane damage to target opposing hero.
